original_text: They will say, “Where is the promise of his coming? For ever since the fathers fell asleep, all things are continuing as they were from the beginning of creation.”
korean_text: 이르되 주께서 강림하신다는 약속이 어디 있느냐 조상들이 잔 후로부터 만물이 처음 창조될 때와 같이 그냥 있다 하니

sentences.original_text: Where is the promise of his coming?
For ever since the fathers fell asleep,
all things are continuing as they were
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 것이 처음과 같이 계속되고 있으니,
